Class PatternsStates

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agent.slang.dm.narrative.data.GenericStates

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PatternsStates
extends GenericStates
    A generic class in order to manage Patterns States of the story. OS Compatibility: Windows and Linux
